thread.title: OraSure Technologies Earnings Conference Call Invitation

author: cnbc.com
title: OraSure Technologies Earnings Conference Call Invitation
text:
2018 First Quarter Earnings Conference Call
Wednesday, May 2, 2018, 5:00 p.m. ET
BETHLEHEM, Pa., April 11, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- OraSure Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:OSUR) has scheduled its regular earnings conference call covering 2018 First quarter financial results, 2018 second quarter financial guidance and certain business developments for 5:00 pm ET (2:00 pm PT) on Wednesday, May 2, 2018.
May 2, 2018 Schedule
4:00 p.m. ET 2018 first quarter financial results press release will be distributed. 4:50 p.m. ET To participate in the conference call, dial (844) 831-3030 (Domestic) or (315) 625-6887 (International) and reference Conference ID #4298046. 5:00 p.m. ET Conference call and simultaneous Webcast begins. The conference call will also be webcast live and may be accessed on the Investor Relations page of OraSure’s website, www.orasure.com . Please click on the webcast link and follow the prompts for registration and access 10 minutes prior to the call.
If you are unable to participate, a replay of the call will be archived on OraSure’s website shortly after the call has ended and will be available for seven days. The replay of the call may be accessed until midnight, May 9, 2018 by dialing (855) 859-2056 (Domestic) or (404) 537-3406 (International) and entering the Conference ID #4298046.
COMPANY CONTACT: Joni Messenlehner, OraSure Technologies, Inc. 610-882-1820, or investorinfo@orasure.com .
Source:OraSure Technologies, Inc.
